alert.note: Alert for Cass; Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Fulton; Marshall; Miami; Northern Kosciusko; Pulaski; Southern Kosciusko; Starke; Western St. Joseph; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 23 at 11:48AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FOR SATURDAY JUNE 24th... An Air Quality Action Day has been declared by the Indiana Department of Environmental Management for portions of north-central and northwest Indiana...and is effect from midnight EDT /11 PM CDT/ tonight to midnight EDT /11 PM CDT/ Saturday night. Ozone levels are expected to be in the Orange or unhealthy for sensitive groups range. People and businesses are urged to avoid activities which lead to ozone and fine particulate formation. These activities include... refueling vehicles or topping off when refueling, using gasoline powered lawn equipment and using charcoal lighter fluid. Positive activities include...car pooling, biking to work, delaying or combining errands and using water based paints. It is recommended that people with respiratory diseases such as asthma limit prolonged outdoor exertion. && For additional information, please visit the IDEM SMOG Watch web site at https://apps.idem.in.gov/smogwatch/ or the EPA AIRNOW web site at www.airnow.gov and click on Indiana.
